CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 6, 1957, pg. 15 reads: "1. M.J. Bodek of the Westinghouse- Oakland Furniture Company proudly displays the Westinghouse electric appliances in their booth"
TitMainTitle: M.J. Bodek standing in Oakland Furniture Company booth in Syria Mosque for the 1957 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
